attributes.action: Give NHS staff a pay rise immediately after the Covid-19 pandemic has ended.
attributes.additional_details:
NHS staff have been risking their lives and the lives of their loved ones everyday during the Covid-19 pandemic to look after the nation. Some NHS staff have even been separated from their families, staying in alternative accommodation to continue to care for the sick.

We want to see all NHS staff, from cleaners to porters, admin to paramedics, nurses to doctors, given a pay rise of at least 10% to show how much we, as a nation, appreciate them.
attributes.background: We want to see all NHS staff given a pay rise of at least 10% after the Covid-19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign these petitions, which call for similar actions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073 

Pay rise for NHS and care staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488 

Reward our healthcare heroes now for risking their lives to fight Covid-19. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318741 

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513 

Introduce a minimum starting wage of £40000 for all Nurses. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315297 

Pay all NHS Staff at least the Real Living Wage
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310615
